preferences.name: Steam
preferences.description: Search through Steam games, apps and menus

preferences.name: Steam folder path
preferences.description: The path to the folder that contains the steamapps and userdata folders

preferences.name: Steam userdata folder name
preferences.description: The name of the userdata subfolder (a number) that describes the current user

preferences.name: Steam API key
preferences.description: The Steam API key to use when fetching owned apps, found at steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey

preferences.name: steamid64 for current user
preferences.description: The Steam ID to fetch owned apps for, found at steamid.io  # TODO: Find native alternative

preferences.name: Get apps from files wait time
preferences.description: The time to wait before updating apps from files

preferences.name: Get apps from Steam API wait time
preferences.description: The time to wait before updating apps from the Steam API

preferences.name: App blacklist
preferences.description: App IDs to hide from the list, separated by commas

preferences.name: Language code
preferences.description: The preferred language of the current user

preferences.name: Sort keys
preferences.description: Separated by commas in priority order. appid,name,description,non_steam,ulaunched_last,ulaunched_times

preferences.name: Maximum items
preferences.description: The maximum number of items to show in the list
